item.description: https://vimeo.com/571367259 One of the key things you need to understand about obsidian if you really want to make the most of it is the concept of atomic note taking.
The promise of apps like Obsidian and Roam Research is to give you a tool for connected note-taking. (If you’re wondering which one is right for you, check out [[Obsidian vs.
